description:
Watching TV programs and films isn't the only thing the Samsung UN40EH5300 is good for - this HDTV also boasts a full web browser, and a variety of entertainment apps. Built in Wi-Fi makes connecting the Samsung television to a home network easy, and the web browser is easily controlled using the remote control. The Smart TV app searches the Samsung television for favorite content, by keyword or genre, and suggests other programs based on current content. Family Story allows photographs to be easily uploaded onto the Samsung UN40EH5300, and stored with messages. Uploaded content can be watched back on the HDTV, or stored on the home network. Other apps include Kid's Story, a fun and educational app, and Fitness, a personal trainer app that manages and monitors work-out information for the whole family. AllShare allows content to be shared across Samsung televisions and devices without the need for wires, and makes backing up media effortless. From social networking to working out and entertaining children, the Samsung UN40EH5300 is well prepared.
